structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Office Of Jury Commissioner For The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Preservation Of Official Records And Papers Compiled And Maintained By Office Of Jury Commissioner
law.text: All official records and papers compiled and maintained by the office of jury commissioner shall be preserved for three years after the calendar year to which they apply. Official records shall include records in automated form on magnetic tapes and disks.
